name: Link Link Fruits
description:
Link Link Fruits is a classic elimination game. You tap two same fruits, they will be eliminated if they can be linked by 3 or less lines. You will pass the level if you clear all fruits within limited time. Gear up for this addictive casual game and you won't be able to put this game down for hours.

Features:
-Very cute and clean HD graphics.
-Game Center leaderboards.
-60 levels.

Enjoy!
